utils

Class Constants.Cards.HandValues

  • java.lang.Object
    • utils.Constants.Cards.HandValues
  • Enclosing class:
    Constants.Cards

    public static final class Constants.Cards.HandValues
extends java.lang.Object
    This class holds the value of combinations a user could have. Each constant is an int value which represents the value of the combination the user has.
